item.title: The Science of Smart Breaks & Focus
item.description:
Why Taking Breaks Improves Focus ðŸ§ 

Studies show that working non-stop leads to burnout and reduced efficiency. Strategic breaks boost concentration, creativity, and memory retention.

How TaskFlow Optimizes Your Study Schedule â³

TaskFlow:

  • Analyzes your past productivity trends ðŸ“ˆ
  • Suggests the best times for work and breaks ðŸ”„
  • Helps you stay energized and avoid burnout ðŸ’¡

Example: The 50/10 Focus Rule

Work for 50 minutes â³ â†’ Take a 10-minute break â˜• â†’ Repeat ðŸ”„ This cycle keeps you refreshed and focused for longer.
